record.description: Members of the class of 1884, Old University of Chicago. Second row, left to right: Laurence Johnson, Saum Song Bo, unidentified woman, Fred R. Swartwout, and Darius Leland; first row: Lydia A. Dexter, unidentified woman. [Photograph] gift of Dr. E. V. L. Brown, January 16, 1934.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on board, archives stamp. Identified as some of the members of the class of '84 U. of C.
